title: Bang Jin Mei Duo
synopsis: The twisty Quma River has fattened thousands of households (rich masters), but the slaves of thousands of households can only lead a miserable life. Among them, the most pitiful of them are Rodin, Xiu Mo, Namu, who lost their parents Four Sisters of Shemara Green. 　　 In the middle of the night, Qian Hu dreamed of coming to Jinshan, full of gold, silver, treasure, pearl and agate, but to take them away, he needed to pay the barley, grapes and butterflies to the god of protection. After waking up from the dream, Qianhu asked Luodan, Xiu Mo and Xie Ma Laqing to set out immediately to find these three passes, but where can they be found in the ice and snow? The three sisters knew that there was no return, but they were forced to set off. In order to save the lives of the three sisters, Namu asked Qianhu to let her find them alone. On the road, the three sisters were transformed into barley, grapes and butterflies, making Namu return quickly, but the return of the three sisters and the cold caused Namu to lose the strength to move, and she froze in the snow. At this time, the God of Gangdisi, who was moved by their story, appeared.(translated from douban)

title: A Fan Tí De Gushi Zhi Zhong Jinzi
synopsis: The rich man Bayi is a well-known miser. In order to get rich, he came up with many strange ways to lend usury to exploit the poor. The poor are often forced into debt by him and there is nowhere to hide. Seeing this situation, Avanti came up with a good way to punish Bayi: he pretended to have made a fortune and made Bayi very jealous. When Bayi couldn't help asking, he revealed that he got mystery from Allah. A spell, silver coins can produce ten times the harvest like a crop. In order to convince Bayi, he first helped Bayi plant ten times the gold in the sand. The greedy Bayi was very excited and gave his own Take out all the gold and give it to Avanti.(translatd from douban)

details.Japanese: 阿凡提的故事之种金子

title: Da Daozei
synopsis: "I am a big thief. I am not afraid of anything. I live a comfortable life. I have fun all day long." The big thief, Mr. Hozenbroz, is a famous villain in the small town. Hidden in a mysterious forest, the police have always been There is no way to take him. 　　 One day, the big thief took away the coffee mill where the grandmother could sing. Grandson Kaspel and his little friend Zopel determined to catch the big thief and retrieve grandma's coffee mill. Unexpectedly, the strategy was seen through by the savvy thieves, and the two were caught by the thieves. Kaspar was sold to the evil great magician, and Zopel was locked up in the thieves’ house to do hard work. Facing the danger, the two clever children bravely dealt with the big thief, and rescued the imprisoned witch, staged a series of thrilling episodes of fighting wits.(translated from douban)

title: Xiyou Ji: Wu Jian Baobei
synopsis: Tang Seng and his apprentice came to Pingdingshan on the way to learn the scriptures and encountered the devil's golden and silver horns. The demon envoy squeezed Wukong down the mountain and arrested Tang Seng and others. After Wukong escapes, he becomes his mother, the nine-genus fox, rescues the master and companions, and restores the golden horn and silver horn.(translated from douban)

title: Wo Cuole
synopsis: Beibei is a naughty kid who likes to scribble. No, as soon as the sanitation worker painted the public walls white, he took out his pen and drew a humpbacked old man and a naughty monkey. While appreciating his work satisfactorily, Beibei let a flying object hit his head. It turned out that there was a lively scene next to him, so he hurried over. 　　 But there are too many people watching the excitement, and Beibei can’t get in no matter how crowded, she’s too tired to watch. While pushing an uncle who was holding her daughter to look at the strangeness, the little girl turned her head and shouted "It's annoying" at him. This annoyed him, and he grabbed the paintbrush and drew a turtle on the little girl. What he didn't expect was that the tortoise came alive and bit his finger with one bite, and he couldn't shake it no matter what.(translated from douban)

title: Yisheng Yu Huangdi
synopsis: The content tells that in ancient times, an emperor had a sarcoma on his head, and he called a civilian doctor and two imperial doctors to see him. Who can cure the emperor's disease will be rewarded. After the three doctors, one civilian doctor advocated the use of acupuncture and moxibustion for treatment. One imperial doctor thought that taking some tonics would cure him, and another imperial doctor said that it was not a disease at all. The emperor was the emperor of the true dragon. The sarcoma is the symbol of Dragon Ball and Shenlong. The emperor believed that the two imperial doctors were right, he rewarded the two imperial doctors and coaxed the civilian doctors out. The emperor took many tonics such as ginseng and deer antler, and after a few days the sarcoma grew bigger and bigger and hugged his head. The emperor hurriedly called the three doctors again for treatment. One imperial doctor didn't know it was good. Another imperial doctor thought it was not a disease. The emperor went down to the earth, and the sarcoma on his head became enlarged, just like the old forehead is a symbol of good luck and longevity. The people's medical advice is that this is an aggravation of the disease, and surgery must be performed to remove the tumor in order to save life. When the emperor heard furious that the civilian doctor was an assassin, he could not help but argue that the civilian doctor was pushed out and killed, and he rewarded the two doctors again. Within a few days, the emperor fell ill and died.(translated from douban)
background: This anime aired in 1990.This anime won "Hua Biao Award" Best Art Film Award.

title: San
synopsis: Although it was sunny, the old man brought an umbrella when he went out. There was heavy rain on the way, and this umbrella was useful. 　　 Seeing the woman holding a young child rushing in the rain, the grandfather walked quickly to her and put the umbrella on top of her head, and saw the child scurrying in the rain with a schoolbag as an umbrella, and he asked him to move under the umbrella. The second-rate guy with a cigarette in his mouth was taking shelter from the rain. Seeing the three people in a leisurely pair under the umbrella, they could not help taking away the umbrella. Then, rain shelters of various identities rushed over to fight for you, grandpa, The woman and the children were squeezed out of the umbrella. When the rain was strong and the wind was violent, the umbrella was blown over. When everyone saw it, they discarded it and scattered to find a place to shelter from the rain. The old man picked up the umbrella and took a lot of effort to fix it, and everyone surrounded like flies.(translated from douban)

title: Jinghua Yuan
synopsis: During the period of Emperor Wu of the Tang Dynasty, the scholar Tang Ao was frustrated and depressed. At the invitation of his wife and brother Lin Zhiyang, he went to sea with the fleet to do business and cruise around the world. I visited countries with different folk customs such as the country of gentlemen, the country of daughters, the country of adults, the country of two sides, the country of no intestines, and the country of wearing chest, and many exciting and interesting things happened along the way.(translated from douban)
background: This anime aired in 1991.The episode 4 of this anime won 1991 Outstanding Film Award of the Ministry of Radio, Film and Television and Honor Award of the Second China Film and Television Animation Exhibition in 1993.

title: Kuaile De Mai Mai Ti
synopsis: The carpenter Maimaiti made a jewelry box and gave it to the little girl. The rich man Bayi insisted that it was made by the garden tree he fell on the road and asked the carpenter to buy a set of furniture for compensation. A few days later, the carpenter built a hut on the mountain. Bayi said it was my property and asked the carpenter to cut down 100 trees for him every year in exchange. In the end, Bayi was crushed by the tree, and the carpenter rescued Bayi. Bayi was touched by this and began to understand the life philosophy of "good is better than evil".(translated from douban)

title: Meijian Chi
synopsis: The art film is a puppet cartoon, adapted from the historical legend of "Brow-foot ruler avenging his parents". The legend has many records in history books, with similar content. Lu Xun also used it as a blueprint to create the novel "Sword Casting" (the original name "Brow Ruler"). 　　The sword-making master Gan Jiang and Mo Xie's apprentice Heizi killed the sacred cow of King Chu during a bullfight. King Chu was furious and ordered him to be executed. The traitorous officials slandered him. King Chu decided to use Heizi's life to threaten the general and Mo Xie to cast an invisible sword for him. Ganjiang and Mo Xie spent three years of work to create two invisible swords for the king of Chu, one female and one male. However, the generals who had a premonition only gave one of them, and both husband and wife died tragically. When the king of Chu sent troops to hunt down Heizi, Xiaomei (another disciple of Gan Jiang and Mo Xie) and Xiao Meijian Chi (the son of Gan Jiang and Mo Xie), the three managed to escape. Meijianzhi grew to 15 years old, and learned the truth about the tragic death of his parents from the little sister, and decided to avenge his parents and the people of the world.(translated from douban)

title: Rainbow Cat & Blue Rabbit: Legend of the Seven Swords
synopsis: In 397 AD, in Zhangjiajie with beautiful scenery, the demonic sect headed by the black-hearted tiger set fire to the mountains, poisoning the living beings, trying to catch the spirit beast of the forest, the jade beast,Kylin, and vainly use the blood of the kirin to strengthen internal strength and dominate the martial arts. In order to maintain the peace and tranquility of the forest, Rainbow Cat’s father joined the Blue Rabbit’s mother and other seven people. Seven swords combined, and eventually defeated Black Heart Tiger, but the Seven Swords were either injured or disabled. Fifty years later, Black Heart Tiger led the Demon Cult to make a comeback. And the only thing that can stop the Black Heart Tiger is to unite the Seven Swords again, but at this time, the Seven Swords, except for Hongmao's father, have been scattered and secluded, and their destination is unknown. In a bloody battle, Rainbow Cat's father was defeated and sacrificed heroically. The young hero Hongmao obeyed his father's death, taking the heavy responsibility of saving the forest environment, and went down the mountain to find other descendants of Six Swords... (from https://movie.douban.com/subject/3204594/ )

details.English: Rainbow Cat & Blue Rabbit: Legend of the Seven Swords

title: Deatte 5-byou de Battle
synopsis: It was just a usual morning. Akira Shiroyanagi, a high schooler who loves games and Konpeito (Japanese sweets), has suddenly been dragged into a battlefield by a mysterious girl who calls herself Mion. The participants are told that they are "erased from the family register, involved in an experiment, and gained certain powers." Akira is determined to win the game with his newfound powers and destroy the organization. Armed with a power no one expects and his "brain" skills, the new period of intelligence battle begins!  (Source: MU, edited)

title: Yeban Guai Sheng
synopsis: On a quiet night, happy singing came from Little Pig’s house. It turned out that Little Pig sang while playing the piano. He said he was very bold and a brave man who was not afraid of any monsters. Suddenly, a ball was thrown in from the window, and the piglet jumped. He picked up the ball tremblingly and glanced at the floating clouds in the sky, the floating clouds changed into a wolf-like pattern, which scared him enough. After that, the little pig closed the window tightly and hid in the bed to sleep, but all kinds of strange noises rang one after another, making the little pig not dared to move on the bed for fear of being eaten by ghosts. The next day, Little Pig told Little White Rabbit and other friends about the night's experience, but no one believed it, and when the scheming big bad wolf approached, he quickly ran away. 　　 It's night again, I wonder if the fairy will come again?(translated from douban)

title: Zhi Dou Wuya
synopsis: The crow snuck away the meat of the old Xiong's house, but the little fox tried his best to stop it. Old Xiong mistakenly thought that the little fox was an accomplice of the crow and reprimanded him. The little fox was very wronged. She tried her best to cheat the meat back from the crow and returned it to the old bear. The old bear was very guilty and praised the little fox. (translated from douban)

title: Zizuozishou
synopsis: The fat man picked up a bunch of flowers halfway, and when he was about to smell the scent, a few bees flew out of the flower, scared him holding the flower and ran away, but the bees were also greedy for the fragrance of flowers, and they began to follow the man. 　　 The man finally rushed to the door of the house. He thought that the bees had been left behind. Who thought they were hidden in his straw hat and had stung several large bags on his head. The man became angry and went to the house to pour the poison into the sprayer, and the bees stopped buzzing. The man happily carried the old hen. The old hen ate the dead bee and laid a big egg. The man swallowed the egg without saying a word. At this moment, he accidentally saw the poison on the table.(translated from douban)

title: Zuiba, Erduo He Yanjing
synopsis: There was a boy.He fooled some disabled people.Then he imagined about life of them.Then he regretted and started to help them.

title: Dong Dong He Gua Gua
synopsis: Once upon a time, an old woman without children lived by the big lake. Her life was very boring. One day, while washing clothes by the lake, she saw a big red fish spit out a big winter melon, and took the big winter melon home. As a result, in the middle of the night, a girl and a boy jumped out of it. , She was so happy that she couldn't help but named them Dongdong and Guagua. 　　 Dongdong is sensible and hardworking. He often helps the old woman do this and that. Everyone likes her; Guagua is naughty and mischievous. He has ghost ideas all the time, and everyone doesn't like him. Although Dongdong is often embarrassed for what Guagua does, they have a very good relationship. Later, in order to make Guagua sensible, Guagua and the old woman played a scene with the big red fish in the lake.(translated from douban)

title: Lianhua Gongzhu
synopsis: This art film is an ink-and-wash cartoon adapted from the story of the same name in "Strange Tales from a Lonely Studio". The screenwriter is Hu Yihong and the art design is Xu Lele. In his dream, scholar Dou Xu was invited to a banquet by the Queen because of his noble character. At the banquet, he met the Queen’s Shanglian "Talented Mansion" by the Queen because of the "Gentleman Loves Lotus". Married with her. Later, when Princess Lotus was attacked by a giant monster, and seeing that she was unable to protect her, Dou Xu woke up abruptly amid the shouts of the book boy and found a poisonous snake entrenched in the hive next door. After killing the poisonous snake and re-nailing the hive, Dou Xu looked at the bee colony regaining joy. He felt relieved and lost.(translated from douban)

title: Xiao Huangyou De Gushi
synopsis: There was a little ferret.It was hurt by a hunter.Then it was saved by animals in the forest.Then the ferret heal.It helped and played with other animals.Then a mouse made to be misunderstood by the animals.It was sad.Then It tried to catch the mice...

details.Synonyms: The story of the little yellow ferret

title: Da Qiqiu
synopsis: When the bear was playing the game of blowing bubbles by himself, a big red balloon floating in the wind attracted him. It wanted to get the balloon down, but the balloon was too high and had to run with the balloon, hoping that it would land soon. The balloon finally fell, but was picked up by the puppy. Although the bear and the puppy both wanted to play with balloons, they were polite and humble. At this time, the little monkey appeared and could not help but said that they had taken the balloon. 　　 The little monkey accidentally hung the balloon on a big tree branch on the edge of the cliff. Seeing this, it turned around and left without saying a word. The bear and puppy were very angry, but they were helpless. Later, the little monkey, puppy, tortoise and little rabbit worked together to remove the balloon, but something unpleasant happened immediately. (translated from douban)

title: Chuntian Li De Xiaotian Shu
synopsis: From winter to spring, a hundred flowers blossom. On the green fields, the birds are singing freely. Their singing awakened the voles family, and the babies jumped on the grass for joy. Uncle Black Bear, who was still immersed in hibernation, was awakened by the baby field mice. Uncle Black Bear was not angry at all, he took the flowers from the little guys, full of joy, and also enjoyed the beauty of spring. A little guy asked Uncle Xiong a question, and the uncle said that only smart Tiantian could answer. Everyone looked around and finally found Tiantian. At this moment, this fantasy-loving little guy is dreaming of flying into the sky, and everyone hit it off and decided to make a big wing that can soar into the sky. 　　 Their dream has finally come true, but an accident happened during the flight...(translated from douban)

title: Jingquan Jiuhu Dui
synopsis: The film describes a prosperous city that turned into a pile of rubbles after a strong earthquake. The police dog rescue team rushed to the disaster area under the leadership of Captain Paulk, and adopted various methods to rescue the victims, settle and treat the wounded. The story of the task completed with the help of animals from all over the world.(translated from douban)

title: Kaixin Guo
synopsis: In the quiet and peaceful forest, the chubby pig opened an unhappy clinic, and all the little animals that encountered sad things can come to him for consultation. Just eat a pistachio and you will feel better immediately. However, if a happy person eats pistachios, it is easy to become super excited and even neurotic. On this day, the little rabbit, little hedgehog, and little sheep came to ask for help. They had all been intimidated and threatened by the cunning and evil big bad wolf before, making them nervous and frightened. After eating the pistachios, Bunny and the others calmed down a bit. 　　 At this moment, the big bad wolf came to the door in fox skin. He lied that he was threatened by the big bad wolf and tricked the pig to open the door. However, his disguise was quickly seen through by the little animals, and the unshaved big bad wolf chased the poor little animals in the cramped cabin... (translated from douban)

title: Xiao Heshang Zhi Youfangseng
synopsis: There were two monks.One day,there was a monk with a big body.Then he lived in the temple.Then he made the two monks to be poor because of eating too much.He always ask the two monks to do something for him.That's why the two monks were tired.Then the two guys tried to rush the big monk out of the temple...

title: Lu Nu
synopsis: The film is adapted from the story of the "Mrs. Deer" in the 85th Cave of Dunhuang Mural in China.Legend has it that there is a deer girl at the foot of Lotus Mountain, who was chased by Xia Guo's hunting team, but was saved by King Yan. King Yan married Deer as his concubine. He gave birth to lotus and was thrown into the river by the Queen Mother. After the lotus was drifting in Xia, 10 boys jumped out and were adopted by King Xia. Ten princes grew up and fought against Yan Kingdom for their adoptive father. The Deer Girl rushed to touch the two kings of Xia and Yan, and turned the fighting into jade silk. (translated from douban)
background: This anime aired in 1993.This anime won The Best Art Film Award of the 14th Chinese Film "Golden Rooster Award".

title: Hu Seng
synopsis: In the vast snowy field, Hu Seng rode a donkey past a small hotel. The bad wine delivered by the store's Xiaoer was poured into the gourd and turned into a fragrant wine. After a drink, Hu Seng poured the remaining wine in the gourd into the hotel’s well. , Suddenly the well is full of wine. After Hu Seng left, Xiao Er served the wine from the well. Since then, the hotel's business has been prosperous, and the old cottage shop has become a decent white-walled tiled house. One year later, in the winter, Hu Seng came to the hotel again, and Xiao Er in the shop was frightened to snatch Hu Seng’s precious gourd, but was found out by Hu Seng and was punished. In the vast snowfield, the black donkey carrying the monk walked leisurely into the depths of the snowfield.(translated from douban)

title: Jiao Jiao Yu Jing Jing
synopsis: On her birthday, the little girl Jingjing received a precious gift-a smart doll with a computer. She gave the doll a lovely name Jiaojiao. With the help of Jiaojiao's magical intelligence, Jingjing and her little friends, kittens and puppies, saw through the tricks of the one-eyed mouse time and time again and united to defeat it. In just a few days, through thrilling and magical experiences, Jiaojiao, Jingjing, kittens and puppies have become inseparable friends; with Jiaojiao’s help, Jingjing has also developed a conscious learning The good habits of picky eaters, caring for small animals and being civilized and polite.(translated from douban)

title: Da Senlin Li De Xiao Gushi
synopsis: In the beautiful forest, there are many cute little animals, such as a pig who can paint ice cream and the sun, a little fox who can fire chocolate, and a playful white mouse princess... They are free and happy together, and small stories happen from time to time. Life is simple, but the friendship between animals is real and touching. "Little Stories in the Big Forest" is a collection of nine short stories such as "White Egg", "Ting Bell", "Pear Violin", "Little Fox's Guns and Cannons" and tells a lot of what happened in the beautiful forest. Lively and interesting things.(translated from douban)

details.Synonyms: Little stories in the big forest

title: Xiyou Man Ji
synopsis: In order to obtain the scriptures, Tang Seng, Wukong, Bajie and Drifting finally came to the Xitian Temple. The Buddha gave Tang Seng a magical combination box and a pair of iron boots. He warned: You must break through the iron boots to open the box. As the saying goes: One day in the sky, thousands of years in the world. The four masters and apprentices returned to the ground, which is now more than 1,500 years later. The female reporter who explored alone accidentally discovered the whereabouts of Tang Seng's master and apprentice in the desert, and immediately reported the huge news, which caused a great sensation. Especially the magical password box has become the focus of attention of all parties. Therefore, around the cipher box, a series of tense, thrilling, humorous and interesting stories were unfolded on the way back to Dongtu by Tang Seng and his apprentice.(translated from douban)

title: Xin Xiyou Man Ji
synopsis: "New Journey to the West" tells the story of Tang Seng on the way to the west to learn the scriptures. One day, they were trapped in the desert. A beam of light led them to the nine heavens. The Tathagata Buddha gave Tang Seng a password box containing priceless treasures and a pair of iron shoes , And told: You must break through the iron shoes to open the password box. Master Tang said goodbye to Tathagata Buddha. While taking the "sightseeing elevator" to join the human room, the restless Monkey King flicked the elevator switch, causing the elevator to lose control. Four of Tang Seng and his apprentice fell into the desert, which is a modern society after more than 1,500 years. The female reporter who was exploring alone accidentally discovered their whereabouts and immediately followed up and reported the experience of the four monks and apprentices in modern society. Modern human beings are full of curiosity about them, and Tang Seng’s password box has also aroused all kinds of modern ghosts and monsters, thus unfolding a series of exciting, tortuous and interesting stories. (translated from douban)

title: Baixue Gongzhu Yu Gingwa Wangzi
synopsis: Soon after Snow White was born, the queen passed away. The stepmother, who was originally a witch incarnation, tried every means to torture the princess, drove her out of the palace and killed her. With the help of the seven dwarfs and the frog, the princess has survived all sorts of perils and came back to life. The prince who was turned into a frog by magic has also returned to his original form. Snow White and the Frog Prince finally defeated the witch and got their happiness (translated from douban)

details.Synonyms: Snow White and the Frog Prince

title: Bai Niao Yi
synopsis: There was a brutal king who specialized in killing birds and liked to eat bird meat. One day the king injured a golden silk bird, and a young man took the injured golden bird home and took care of it carefully. The golden silk bird became a beautiful and lovely little Miao girl. When the king asked the peasants to pay for the birds, the girl conjured up many birds to tease the king and his courtiers. Finally, the king became angry and asked the little girl to make a bird's clothing. The aviary became countless birds chasing the king. The king was finally punished and fell into the rapids.(translaated from douban)

title: Boshi Wa De Gushi: Dou Bianselong
synopsis: The story is about the fight between a frog and a chameleon.

details.Japanese: 博士蛙的故事：斗變色龍

title: Riyuetan
synopsis: Long ago, there lived a brave young man named Dajian and a beautiful girl Shuishe on the treasure island of Taiwan. They admired each other and often met under the big tree. Suddenly one day, the whole earth fell into darkness. It turned out that the demon dragon living in the black water pool stole the sun and the moon. Dajian and Shuishe waded through the mountains to find the golden axe and golden scissors, killed the demon dragon, and rescued the sun and moon. Later, they became two big mountains guarding the sun and the moon by the water. People called it Sun Moon Lake.(translateed from douban)

title: Shenma Yu Yaodao
synopsis: A long, long time ago, the Baoan people living in the Yellow River Basin were abused by the Sand Demon King. The demon king drives out the kind people and turns the rich land into yellow sand wasteland. At the critical moment, a brave grandfather pierced the demon king's right eye with a powerful waist knife, temporarily frightening this hateful guy. In the next 100 years, the Baoan people migrated to Jinshishan, Gansu, but the shortage of water threatened their survival. Grandpa's grandson Dowa volunteered to go to the source of the Yellow River to seek help from the White Horse. Bai Shenma agreed to Dowa's request and sent the clear spring water to Jinshishan. Who knows, this scene was seen by the demon king’s pawn, the owl eating cries, it awakens the sleeping demon king, and will once again impose the disaster on the people of the Baoan people... 　　 This film is adapted from the folklore of the Baoan people.(translated from douban)

title: Die Shuangfei
synopsis: The story is about a butterfly flying.Then many animals wanted to hurt it.

title: Huan You Diqiu Bashi Tian
synopsis: This film is adapted from the novel of the same name by the famous French science fiction writer Jules Verne. The story takes place in London, England in 1872. In a club dedicated to local gentlemen’s leisure and chat, a gentleman named Fokker was chatting with friends, threatening to travel the world in 80 days and was willing to Twenty thousand pounds bet. Afterwards, Fokker took his entourage, Basspattu (Passepartout), hurriedly left London and embarked on an unprecedented adventure...(translated from douban)

title: Matouqin De Gushi
synopsis: On the vast grassland, the Mongolian teenager Su He accidentally found a group of beautiful white horses in the snow. He brought the white horse back to the yurt. Through careful care, the little white horse thrived and established a deep trust and friendship with him. The grandmother named the white horse Xuelong, and everyone liked this humanoid little guy. Su He played with Xuelong on the grassland every day. One day, he rescued a beautiful little girl, and the other party's true identity was the prince's daughter. The princess suggested that Su He take Xuelong to participate in the horse race in Naadam. She believed that the blood dragon would win. As expected by the princess, Xue Long took the lead and took the lead. However, the greedy lord wanted to occupy Xuelong, and even beat Su He violently for this. The legend of Matouqin spreads... 　　 This film is adapted from Mongolian folklore.(translate from douban)

title: He De Chuanshuo
synopsis: The helpless girl Hemei met a boy named Haisheng in order to save a wounded little crane. The kind Haisheng mother adopted Hemei. Haisheng encountered a storm during a fishing trip and unfortunately fell into the water... Hemei concealed the truth in order to comfort her sick mother, and went to ask her mother for a doctor alone. Due to physical and mental fatigue and the muddy road, she unfortunately fell under the bridge and turned into a beautiful crane. However, Haisheng returned home due to an accidental rescue. When he learned that He Mei was no longer alive, he was so mournful that he gradually turned into a red-crowned crane that looked up to the sky...(translated from baidu baike)

title: Renshen Wangguo
synopsis: On the ancient Changbai Mountain, there is a ginseng kingdom. At a ginseng nation’s centennial celebration, the king took out the town’s ginseng national treasure. The gleaming national treasure was discovered by King Xiong Feng of the animal kingdom. Xiong Feng, who had long been thinking about the ginseng national treasure, took the opportunity to snatch the national treasure. Unexpectedly, the sly Eagle King of the Bird Kingdom hidden in the dark was secretly replaced. The silly bear did not find out. It secretly hid the fake national treasure in a tree hole. It was seen by Lagoon and tricked it to put the national treasure in the aquarium country to be safer. Just as Lagoon sneaked away with the national treasure, the dumb bear discovered Deceived, chased and defeated Lagu Jing. Little Sanwa came to the country of beasts for national treasures, and used magic to fight against Xiong Wei. The group of beasts in the Beast Forest were not his opponents. Xiong Feng used tricks to fool Sanwa. The little beast monsters smuggled the national treasure to the aquatic nation. Sanwa was searched for and was conspired by Lagoon. The female fish mother came to save Sanwa when she was in distress. The national treasure, can he find out that the national treasure is fake? Can the real national treasure be recovered? Still have to experience those twists and turns?(translated from douban)

title: Shen Di
synopsis: Under the beautiful Daqing Mountain, A Liang, a young Bai from the Bai nationality, played beautiful music on his flute and grazes cattle on the green grassy hillside. At this moment, the loyal little yellow dog rushed in anxiously. The overbearing rich man claimed that this was his family's land, so he could not help but kill A Liang's cattle, even the little yellow dog. The sad A Liang sat alone in the woods and wept. At this time, the kind mountain god appeared and directed him to go to Qingfengling to find a sacred cow that could cultivate thousands of acres a day. But the sacred cow needs to hear the music played by the sacred flute to be obedient. In order to find the sacred flute and the sacred cow, A Liang bid farewell to Abba and Ama and embarked on a journey full of difficulties and obstacles bravely. There are not only vicious snakes but also terrifying mountain monsters along the way. Will the kind and brave A Liang finally find the god cow? 　　 This film is adapted from folk myths and legends.(translated from douban)

title: Yao Shu Yu Songshu
synopsis: In the deep mountain and old forest where the Blang people have lived for generations, there is a huge rock. Legend has it that the seed of the devil is under the rock. Once it comes out, it will harm the world. Therefore, the people never dared to approach it for half a step. Until one day, when the opportunity was ripe, after the lightning and thunder, the devil's seeds took root and sprouted, arbitrarily growing, and in a blink of an eye it became a huge scarlet tree. The branches and vines of the demon tree seemed to have life. They spread arbitrarily, eroding the surrounding flowers and trees, harming local people and animals, and destroying the villages of the Brown people. The little boy Yuduo remembered his grandfather's instructions and desperately protected the village's fire. The villagers and animals finally came to a habitat. They accidentally discovered that the demon tree would sleep at night, so they decided to cut down the evil spirit. But the demon tree is not afraid of being cut and burned. The brave little squirrel volunteered to find the demon tree’s weakness... 　　 The film is adapted from the ancient legend of the Blang people.(translated from douban)

title: Hong Shi Feng
synopsis: Yugu people live in Qilian Mountains, and they are often ravaged by snow demon. Young Yingla stepped forward and finally exchanged his life for the happy life of the Yugu people.(translate from douban)

title: Huoba Jie
synopsis: A long time ago, in a village of Yi people lived a beautiful and intelligent girl Axi. The greedy and ugly chieftain coveted Axi's beauty and tried to use his power to marry the door. Axi was unmoved and drove away the matchmaker who came to propose marriage. After that, the pretending celestial master came up with conspiracies and tricks. He pretended that Axi was a fairy reborn and must marry their celestial chicken, otherwise he would be killed by a tengu. He tried to use this trick to deceive Axi. The mansion of the chief tusi. Unexpectedly, the wise Axi saw through his tricks and instead drunk the Tianji Tengu. During the period, he was helped by the brave and upright hunter Azhi, and the two affectionate men and women became married. But the chieftain was not willing to fail. They came up with a new strategy to frame Axi... 　　 This film is adapted from the ancient legend of the Yi people.(translated from douban)

title: Kuerlei Xiang Li
synopsis: Korla in Xinjiang is rich in delicious, juicy, sweet and delicious fragrant pears, and behind this red fruit there is an evocative legend: a long time ago, Korla was a barren place, and it was difficult for the locals to eat delicious fruits. Finally, a hawker selling pears arrived, but it happened that he met an insatiable and arrogant rich man. He occupied all the fragrant pears and beat and bullied ordinary people. The sad grandfather hopes to let his grandson taste the taste of pears. He originally planned to find the saplings of fragrant pears alone, but the kind and upright girl Elman decided to embark on this difficult journey. She overcame the scorching flame mountain, defeated the poisonous snake entrenched everywhere, and finally reached the destination. The people of Korla are waiting for the long-awaited sapling... 　　 The film is adapted from the ancient legend of the Uyghur people.(translated from douban)

title: Poshui Jie
synopsis: The Dai girl, Yuxiang, is smart and cute, and hates the Demon King. For the people, she stepped forward and finally defeated the Demon King with the help of the people.(translated from douban)

title: Mie Yao Ji
synopsis: A long time ago, in the emerald green valley where the Yao people lived, there was an evil unicorn dragon. It does evil and does nothing evil. During the tour, she saw the beautiful Yao girl Xiaohongmei, so she looted her back to the cave with the intention of getting married. Xiao Hongmei's grandmother was desperate, and suddenly ate a red fruit on the way home. It didn't take long for Guo Guo to have her belly, her abdomen gradually bulged, she was pregnant, and soon gave birth to a cute fat baby, which finally gave grandma's broken heart and some comfort. On the other hand, Xiao Hongmei refused to obey the evil dragon's request and was imprisoned. She had rescued a bird before. With the help of a kind little mouse, the bird escaped from the cave and came to the grandmother's house to report the letter. In order to save her sister who had never met, Xiaowa decided to take the risk and get rid of the evil dragon... 　　 This film is adapted from Yao folklore.(translated from douban)

title: Xue Hu
synopsis: The film narrates an unremarkable story: On the grassland, a female fox rushes to make a living, but is finally captured by a hunter, and the little fox waiting to be fed also tragically died in the wind and snow. (translated from baidu baike)

title: Shier Shengxiao QuanJiafu
synopsis: Shanghai Kaiyuan Information Development Co., Ltd. invested in the cartoon television film "The Magical World of 12 Family Portraits". The chief planner Dr. Chen Fu led a group of well-known cartoon artists. They are based on the strange mouse, the big cow, the power tiger, the elf rabbit, the big dragon, and Geely. Snake, vitality horse, obedient sheep, naughty monkey, ancient chicken, loving dog, happy pig zodiac cartoon stars as the characters, unfold a series of humorous, relaxing, exciting and interesting stories. The plot is compact and interlocking, making people wanting. 　　 The main characters in this film are either clever and fanciful, or mischievous and humorous, or mighty and strong, or stubborn, or honest and cute...... The characters are full, distinct, vivid, and accurately positioned.(translated from douban)

details.Synonyms: Family Portrait of the Chinese Zodiac

title: Ouch, mother!
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Guai Cheng
synopsis: The cartoon series "Strange City" tells the adventure of twin brothers and sisters walking around and jumping. Driven by their curiosity, they accidentally knocked over the ultra-gene miniaturizer newly developed by father and became little people. They were discovered by the bat spirits and caught them in the cave of the rat demon. The rat demon is evil, possessing sorcery, and vainly trying to rule mankind. When it sees the younger brothers and sisters, it has a whim, trying to get the secret recipe from them, so that it can learn from Monkey King and get into the belly of Princess Iron Fan. The method here achieves the goal of dominating mankind. In order to obtain the secret recipe of the supergene miniature agent, the rat demon resorted to all conspiracy and insidious means to launch a full-scale attack on the brother and sister. The rat demon instructs the bat spirit and the poisonous hedgehog to deceive the brother and sister into the "weird city". There are many small cities in the "Strange City", and they are all dwarves. There are many weird things in "Strange City". The brothers and sisters have withstood all the tests in the "weird city", fought against the rat monsters, did not reveal the top secret of the supergene miniatures, and avoided the catastrophe of mankind. The villain headed by the rat demon was finally punished due to it. The whole film is exaggerated and absurd, with profound meaning, climaxing, and rich in imagination. It is a childlike film. (translated from douban)

title: Yazi Zhentan
synopsis: "Duck Detective" mainly tells the story of the duck detective Miss Melard and her nephew Inspector Weller, who have solved one case after another with their ingenuity. In every fascinating detective story, Miss Maillard is so resourceful and can always solve it with great creative methods. Miss Maillard has an unusual weapon to control the enemy: her wings can turn everyday things into tools to subdue the enemy. Miss Maillard's mind is still very meticulous, and she can always find new clues at the end of the branch, and then Weiler cooperates with arresting criminals.(translated from douban)

title: Zhongdian Fuzi
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Xiao Caomao
synopsis: Little Straw Hat and "Pig Brother" live on the same earth. Because of hackers' tricks, Pig Brothers continue to do stupid things that destroy the ecology. With the help and education of the little straw hat, everyone finally understood: There is only one earth, and we should protect the beautiful planet on which we live together.(translated from douban)

title: Shier Shengxiao Guanjiafu Zhi Wangluo Shijie Lixian
synopsis: "12 Family Portrait Online World Adventure" is a thrilling story with bizarre twists and turns, humor and fun by 12 family portrait cartoon stars. 　　 The 12 family portraits in the online world are very popular among netizens. These cartoon stars are hated by shadow demons who preach violence and hate peace. The shadow demon instructed his men, Dianping, gunmen and samurai, to do everything possible to frame 12 family portraits. 　　 And the cartoon stars, relying on their wit, bravery and team spirit, continue to turn dangers into a breeze. In the climax of the struggle, they found that to defeat the Shadow Demon and his men, they must seize the Shadow Demon's password box. They overcame all kinds of difficulties and obstacles, unexpectedly seized the password box, and finally defeated the Shadow Demon.(translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 十二生肖全家福之网络世界历险

title: Fengchen Xiao Youxia
synopsis: The cartoon "Little Ranger" tells a legendary story widely circulated by ancient Chinese little heroes. If there is no ambition, these eleven, two, fifteen and six-year-old heroes are often caught in a vortex of various contradictions and trapped in a certain historical period due to the social and historical environment at that time. However, with their tenacious perseverance and extraordinary wisdom, they have repeatedly gotten out of trouble and won by surprise.(translated from douban)

title: Hong Haier Chuanqi
synopsis: The story is about the adventure of Hong Haier.

title: Jia You Kaixin Guo
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Bravo Dong Dong
synopsis: This cartoon, known as the growth story of 14-year-old boys and girls, meticulously picks up the ordinary trivial things in sensitive, sprouting, and special life stages. It uses early dubbing and incorporates fashion design, music, fashion, life, and network elements to tell the hero in the film Dongdong and his peers Meilan, loofah, shrimp, Weichao, Moka, Sanbao, etc. and their teachers and parents. 　　 Bravo is usually translated as awesome, "Bravo, Dongdong" means "great, Dongdong". Dongdong is the leading actor of the film. The 14-year-old Dongdong has many troubles at this age, sometimes irritable and sensitive, sometimes arrogant, and sometimes conceited.(translated from douban)

title: Caibao Xiao Huli
synopsis: The 13-episode cartoon "Treasure Little Fox" was completed at the end of 2001. It is composed of 13 short stories. They are "Newsman", "Brotherhood", "New House", "Treasure Hunt" and "Encounter" Astronaut, "The Way of Business", "The Lost Detective", "Super Dance Partner", "Machine Master", "Traveling Storm", "Fantastic Cake", "Apprenticeship", "Ah, a friend, a friend ", "New Fox and Fake Tiger". 　　 It takes Gazi and his cousin as the central characters. Each episode tells a story and shows various interesting events between them and other animals.(translated from douban)

title: Feilong Tian Jiang
synopsis: The toys dared not say anything, only the upright "skates" stood up and resolutely resisted, but were expelled and left homeless. In spite of the threat of the big tooth dog and the temptation of the cat in the T-shirt, the compassionate rag doll is willing to give up a good future and go to the "skates" alone. The two were taken in by the kind trash can and finally had a place to live. 　　 One day, the "skates" spotted a kite floating on the Denggui, which was disconnected from nowhere, and there was a playful and lovely companion dragon on it. The "skates", rag dolls and trash cans discussed together and decided to return the kite and companion dragon to the original owner. 　　Unexpectedly, this matter was discovered by the big tooth dog and the T-shirt cat, and learned the secret of the kite from an ancient book-whoever owns it and the companion dragon can be the emperor of the Shenlong Kingdom. So, around the kite and companion dragon, an interesting and tortuous story unfolded in the Shenlong Kingdom...(translated from douban)

title: Shui De Zhangfu Li De Zui Yuan
synopsis: The story is about a competition of having the most far distance with their husband.

details.Synonyms: Whose husband is the furthest away

title: Huíxiang
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Baiyu Tang
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Mogui Xinpian
synopsis: The Devil Chip of Computer Girl This is a philosophical film with a strong science fiction color. In the 22nd century, the young computer prodigy, Green Boy, traveled through the time tunnel and came to the Tang Dynasty a thousand years ago, and met the Tang monk and apprentice in the story of Journey to the West. The film closely revolves around the Devil Chip and Angel Chip. In the film, Green Boy, Tang Seng's mentor, Red Boy, Bull Demon King, White Bone Spirit, etc. have undergone various changes after being stained with devil chips or angel chips, showing the contest between good and evil.(translated from douban)

title: Tu Hongse De Luotuo
synopsis: The story is about the adventure of a camel.

title: Sheng Jian
synopsis: The story is about how a man beating a bad guy.

title: Bai Ge Dao
synopsis: A hundred years after the war, Baige Island was a simple celebration. But it has attracted a war of aliens competing for the mysterious stone statue. Unprepared Baige Island was suddenly panicked. Under the alien rule at this stage, several people who were enemies are forced to live together on Baige Island. The aliens, under the pretext of finding the heads of their races hidden in the human race, rebelled, and instigated humans to suspect each other and kill. And he acts as a savior, from the face to make mankind surrender spiritually. Under the coercion of force, the ignorant people guillotine their neighbors-"the rebellion of aliens". Young Tianwang, bearing the same humiliation, endured the humiliation and went to the realm of Yin and Yang alone to collect the seventh element to deal with aliens. On the way, he experienced life and death hardships, and his soul and body were tortured. Under his leadership, the teenagers fought desperately against evil, reshaping the dignity of mankind with their precious lives and blood.(translated from douban)

title: Chaoji Qiumi
synopsis: "Chaoji Qiumi" was produced by Shanghai Art Film Studio and adapted from an online novel of the same name published by Zhou Rui. With humor and humor, each episode is formed into a separate chapter, with internal connections and no continuity of time and space. Taking the colorful and colorful stories experienced by the fans Kirk as the main line, a series of stories are developed with fan groups and football players as the main description objects.(translated from douban)

title: Da Yingxiong Diqing
synopsis: An accident caused Di Qing (voiced by Jin Feng) to be swept away by the flood. Fortunately, he was rescued and taken in by a monk who had escaped from the world. With the monk, Di Qing learned a martial art. Eight years later, Di Qing, who had no attachment to Hong Chen, wanted to cut his hair and become a monk, but was stopped by the monk. Under the monks' persuasion, Di Qing returned to Tokyo and joined the team to defend his family and the country. Di Qing, who was full of justice, went to the government to surrender because he injured the arrogant emperor Sun Yi. He met Lord Bao and Prince Zheng, who were observant of Qihao. With the help of the two, Di Qing was freed from the crime and was left by Prince Zheng Be a bodyguard. In the subsequent twists and turns, Di Qing learned how to use wisdom instead of relying on force to solve problems. After bidding farewell to Prince Zheng, Di Qing went to the border and became a subordinate of the female general Yang Paifeng. In the days and nights spent together, Di Qing and Yang Paifeng had a great love between them.(translated from douban)

title: Miko no Tsutome!
synopsis: The slightly mysterious daily life of Sakura Miko, a virtual shrine maiden at the Dennou Sakura shrine.

title: Curry Meshi in Miracle
synopsis: An unprecedented, over-the-top collaboration between Nissin Curry Meshi and hololive has become a reality! This is the music video for the original song, Curry Meshi in Miracle, sung by Spice Love (Oozora Subaru, Minato Aqua, Usada Pekora) (Source: YouTube description)

details.Japanese: カレーメシ・イン・ミラクル

title: Xiurong Zhen
synopsis: In the quiet local of "The Town", everyone—or at least, everyone who's someone—wears a mask. These aren't like your average face masks, however; only successful applicants can alter their facial appearance forever. The masks are commonly-acknowledged symbols of respectability. Masks make people beautiful, masks make marriage easier, masks bring everyone closer together—or so it goes.  However, for Ruoqing—one of the mask factory’s best craftsmen—the prospect of wearing a mask of her own grows slimmer by the day. She's only growing older, and her younger brother Laiyong doesn't make things easier whenever he stirs a ruckus at school. When Ruoqing gathers the courage to confront her personal plagues, she uncovers family secrets that may have best been left hidden. (Source: Asian Movie Pulse)
background: "THE TOWN" won the "Jean-Luc Xiberras" Award for a First Film in the 2020 Annecy International Animation Film Festival and the Best Short Film Award at the 2020 FIRST Youth Film Festival.

title: Da Erduo Tu Tu Season 1
synopsis: Hu Tutu is a clever, mischievous and intelligent three-year-old kid. He is naturally happy, kind-hearted, likes to be nosy, energetic, very curious about things around him, and has his own unique insights and super imagination. His words and deeds are often shocking. He is crazy about thinking. The biggest feature is that it is delicious. Whenever he mentions exams, he can think of roasted sweet potatoes and lamb skewers. He also observes and imagines it as a delicious tea. In order to have snacks, he can make things that go against his own principles. The thing, his cuteness and cleverness make everyone laugh.
background: This anime won The 23rd China TV Golden Eagle Awards "Best Director award" and "Excellent Feature Art Film award".

details.Japanese: 大耳朵圖圖 第一季

title: Da Erduo Tu Tu Season 2
synopsis: The second season of "Da Erduo Tu Tu".

details.Japanese: 大耳朵图图 第二季

title: Da Erduo Tu Tu Season 3
synopsis: The season 3 of Da Erduo Tu Tu.

details.Japanese: 大耳朵图图 第三季

title: Da Erduo Tu Tu Season 4
synopsis: The season 4 of "Da Erduo Tu Tu".

details.Japanese: 大耳朵图图 第四季

title: Da Erduo Tu Tu Season 5
synopsis: The season 5 of "Da Erduo Tu Tu".

details.Japanese: 大耳朵图图 第五季

title: Da Erduo Tu Tu Zhi Meishi Kuangxiangqu
synopsis: Hu Tutu, a confused and greedy kindergarten kid, has an unparalleled obsession with "eating". His dream is to eat food all over the world. Tutu's mother is troubled by her son's "nothing good". Under the guidance of Jackie Chan's mother, Tutu, who could not withstand the temptation of food, embarked on the difficult road of the "Little Chef God" competition. After many tests, Hu Tutu, an ordinary child who was not optimistic by the organizers, won the championship unexpectedly and became a bright star in one fell swoop. Tutu's mother felt a sense of satisfaction and pride that she had never had before, but Tutu, who was sought after by everyone, felt increasingly unhappy. 　　 The Tutu family has not yet enjoyed the happiness of becoming famous, but they are facing a sudden crisis of trust. Can the Tutu family prove their innocence? A arduous and hilarious tracking journey is about to begin. (translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 大耳朵图图之美食狂想曲

title: Da Erduo Tu Tu Zhi Tu Tu Zhihui Wangguo
synopsis: Hu Tutu is a clever, mischievous and intelligent three-year-old kid. He is naturally happy, kind-hearted, likes to be nosy, energetic, very curious about things around him, and has his own unique insights and super imagination. His words and deeds are often shocking. He is crazy about thinking. The biggest feature is that it is delicious. Whenever he mentions exams, he can think of roasted sweet potatoes and lamb skewers. He also observes and imagines it as a delicious tea. In order to have snacks, he can make things that go against his own principles. Things, his cuteness and cleverness make everyone laugh.(translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 大耳朵图图之图图智慧王国

title: The Mysteries of Providence
synopsis: An Liying, a teacher in the quiet Linglong Town Primary School, claimed to have seen a monster. There are fewer and fewer fish in the lake. In order to be famous, reporter Tian Moxi also came to join in the fun. After investigation, Zhang Star, Yang Na and Ma Di discovered that the monster was a water monster in the lake. It asked the mayor Lu Yiming to tell him about the pollution of the lake. And Timothy's water monster is dressed up by himself, he is to be famous. The story begins with this first secret...(translated from douban)

title: Tiancai Faming Jia
synopsis: In order to be lazy, Cui Xi, a genius inventor, would invent a robot to do homework and housework instead of her. In order to let her good friend Xie Mosi build up her self-confidence and successfully become the class monitor, Cui Xi helped invent the robot assistant.(translated from douban)

title: Xiao Shu Yijia Qin
synopsis: The magical Prince Edward Island is the heaven of mice, and the little mouse Eckhart lives in this paradise. It has inherited the blood of its father. It is a happy, brave, curious and adventurous mouse. Grandfather Tomis, mother Clara, and sister Mavis took good care of him in every possible way. But Eckhart, who is curious about the world around him, is determined to find his own territory. Eckhart challenged himself in this happy big family, and learned the principles of life one by one. It originally hated the smell on the skunk and refused to make friends with it, but when the evil cat wanted to eat it, it turned out that its nasty smell drove away its natural enemies, so it understood that it could not despise the shortcomings of others, and the shortcomings sometimes It can also be transformed into strengths. Believing in yourself is the real secret to fulfilling your wishes... It was through this wonderful experience full of unknowns that Little Hart gradually learned the virtues of enterprising, friendship, and sincerity. And this is exactly what this cartoon wants to bring to Chinese children.(translated from douban)

title: Zhonghua Meide
synopsis: In response to General Secretary Jiang’s call to "rule the country by virtue" and "use the past for the present", we have formulated a plan to make the traditional Chinese virtue stories into a series of cartoons, which will be a grand sister film of the large-scale cartoon series "Heroes from Ancient Times" roll out. We refer to the content of the moral education curriculum of the nine-year compulsory education in primary and secondary schools, as well as relevant historical records, and select one hundred well-known short stories of ancient and modern virtues, according to filial piety to parents, respect to teachers, unity and friendship, determination to study diligently, humble, polite, and honest Keeping promises and other themes are classified and produced, including, "Goujian", "Fan Zhongyan's loyalty", "Recommendation", "Ban Chao throws a pen to join the army" and other well-known stories, the purpose is to pass the cartoon, an art that young children love to hear Form, coordinate with school education, publicize national culture, and popularize traditional morality.(translated from douban)

title: Shuai Gou Hei Pi
synopsis: This one takes place in the virtual world. Heipi, a high-tech creature jointly developed by a group of scientists, in order to save the virtual world from being harmed by evil forces, led a group of children into the magical virtual world of the computer, and launched a battle between good and evil against the bully Coos. This group of children are all masters of playing CD games, and after entering the virtual world, they assisted the black skin against Coos. In addition to them, there is a light bulb teacher who loves to invent things and provides many high-tech weapons to fight evil forces. 　　 In the virtual world "Candy Kingdom", the game software experienced the terrible virus invaded by Coos, which turned the game that was full of joy into a crisis. In particular, the adventures encountered in the "Mushroom Forest" made them both scared and warm...When they entered the "Crystal Island", they discovered that the motivation of the virtual world was born from this. The owner of the crystal island that controls this power source turned out to be a party of Coos. Finally, in order to maintain the normal world. The partners fought fiercely against the Cousc group. 　　 In the fierce battle, although the black skin and others tried all means, they still lost to the indestructible kakang of Kus. In Huck’s unintentional conversation, everyone discovered that there were two small missiles at the Candy King. Hepi decides to borrow another surviving small missile from the Candy King. At the same time, Teacher Bulb asked Ping Ping and Huck to restore the ability of the injured Parrot. Unexpectedly, the accident was discovered by Coos, and Xia Kakang followed him. At this critical moment, the Force Mage hiding in the belly of Teacher Bulb reminded Mr. Bulb to use the Parrot Transfiguration to fight against Kus. (translated from douban)

title: The Legend of Bow
synopsis: The recap of "Sui Tang Heroes".

title: Ma Lanhua (2006)
synopsis: Legend has it that Malianhua is a magical flower that can realize any wish, but no one has seen it. 　　 Two twin sisters live under Malan Mountain. The older sister Da Lan is lazy and the younger sister Xiao Lan is hardworking. Da Lan didn't work, and played with the old cat all day long. 　　 Xiaolan married the young Ma Lang on the Malan Mountain. They lived a happy life with their hardworking hands. 　　 There is an old wolf on the mountain who has always wanted to get Malianhua and live a life for nothing. 　　 Xiaolan and Ma Lang went home to visit their parents and brought many gifts. Dalan was very jealous when she saw it. Xiaolan wore a small flower on her head, Dalan misunderstood that it was the magical Malianhua in the legend. She thinks that Xiaolan is living a good life with the power of Malanhua. 　　 The old cat has always had a desire to be able to speak. 　　 So Da Lan, at the instigation of the old wolf and the old cat, launched an operation to win the Malanhua... In order to get the flowers on Xiaolan’s head, Da Lan and Old Wolf accidentally made Xiao Lan fall into the river. Da Lan was dumbfounded. When Ma Lang came in anxious time, Da Lan had no choice but to pretend to be Xiao Lan and Ma Lang together. Go up to Malan Mountain. 　　 Carrying the guilt of "killing" her sister, Da Lan finally got Malanhua after wind and rain, through all kinds of dangers, and she can finally make a wish to Malanhua and let her sister "live". The old wolf and the old cat are also in ecstasy, but things are not as simple as they thought... 　　 When Xiao Lan stood in front of Da Lan again, everything became clear. What Dalan got was just an ordinary flower, but they were pleasantly surprised to discover and understand that as long as they worked hard with their own diligent hands, everyone would have hope to realize their wishes. (translated from douban)

title: Ma Lanhua(2009)
synopsis: The story takes place in the picturesque Malan Mountain. Malan Mountain is a symbol of Malan Mountain, and it is also an important place to protect Malan Mountain's endless prosperity. Although Da Lan (voiced by Lin Chiling) and Xiaolan (voiced by Chen Hao) are sisters, their personalities are completely opposite. Da Lan is lazy and selfish, admiring vanity, while Xiao Lan is kind, diligent, gentle and considerate. One day, Xiao Lan accidentally met Ma Lanhua’s patron saint Ma Lang (Dawning). Xiao Lan’s integrity and liveliness quickly attracted Ma Lang’s attention. It didn’t take long for the two to fall in love. Da Lan felt very jealous. The evil vine demon (voiced by Wei Silan) discovered Da Lan's flaws and used her gloom to obtain the precious Malianhua. The loss of Malanhua means that Malan Mountain will no longer exist. In order to protect the homeland that they depend on for survival, Xiaolan and Malang embarked on a dangerous journey.(translated from douban)
background:
In July 2009, won the "Sixth China (Changzhou) International Animation Art Week"-Special Jury Award
In October 2009, won the "27th Chinese Film Golden Rooster Award"-Best Art Film
In October 2009, he was nominated for the "Thirteenth China Film Huabiao Award"-Excellent Cartoon Award
In October 2009, won the "Fourth China Jilin International Animation Exhibition"-Best Movie Cartoon Award, Best Music Award
In November 2009, won the "Golden Dolphin Award" in the "Second Xiamen International Animation Festival"-the best animation film for film and television
In November 2009, he was nominated for the "Golden Panda Award" of the "Tenth Sichuan TV Festival"-Best Cinematic Cartoon Award
In November 2009, won the "First China Top Ten Most Valuable Industries"-Film and Television Animation Works Award
In December 2009, won the 2009 "China Animation Annual Conference"-film and television animation recommended works
In December 2009, won the second prize of "The Second China Cultural Heritage Animation Competition"-Animation (Social Group)
In June 2010, he was nominated for the "Magnolia Award" of the "16th Shanghai TV Festival"-Best Domestic Cartoon
In April 2010, won the "Sixth China International Animation Festival" "Monkey Award"-Best Chinese Animation Feature Film Award
In August 2010, he was nominated as the "World Animation Billboard"-Top Ten Animation Works of the Year
In January 2012, won the "Chinese Culture and Art Government Awards First Animation Award"-Best Animation Film Award

title: Xiao Zhuo Ma
synopsis: The whole play always revolves around the clue of the hunting and protection of Tibetan antelopes, interpreting a mythical story with ups and downs and vivid twists. The Tibetan antelopes are free spirits of the plateau land. In order to protect this noble population, the old Tibetan antelope king gave his life in a duel with a poisonous spider trying to hunt the Tibetan antelope. Gesanghua gave birth to the innocent, kind, smart, and brave Tibetan girl Dolma in his legacy. In the primeval forest, she and Zhuo Qi were helped by birds, beasts, flowers and trees. In order to defeat poisonous spiders and protect the Tibetan antelope flock, they withstood various tests and finally found the extremely beautiful Lake of Dreams, and finally defeated the devil scorpion and the lame poisonous spider, and brought seven or seventy-nine Tibetan antelope flocks. On the emerald island of the lake of dreams...(translated from baidu baike)

title: Jingling Nuhai Xiao Zhuo Ma
synopsis: The story takes place in the beautiful Tibetan plateau. In order to protect the elven Tibetan antelope and the evil banshee spider, green gecko, and red bat, the little Zhuoma fought against the bad guys, withstood various severe tests, and found the extremely beautiful lake of dreams. In the end, they defeated the devil king scorpion and the lame poisonous spider, and brought the seven forty-nine Tibetan antelopes to the Emerald Island in the Lake of Dreams...(translated from douban)

title: Xibai Po
synopsis: The main line of the film is the action of the children's league members and the descendants of the revolution that defeated the enemy's sneak attack on Xibaipo, and tells the moving story of this revolutionary holy land. The head of the 　　 children’s regiment, Walnut, took her little sister Zaohua and her little friend Da Jinggua, secretly went to the front line to join the army without telling the adults. On the way, I accidentally ran into an enemy spy who was looking for Xibaipo Village in the mountains, and learned of the enemy's plan to bomb the Xibaipo Party Central Command post from inside and outside. Walnut decided to return to the village immediately to report. Under the leadership of Walnut, the children passed through the Milky Way Cave, climbed over Baipoling and Shenlong Mountain, and dealt with the enemies who were following them all the way. In the end, Walnut risked his life to complete the task of reporting the letter while protecting the escape of his partners, and ushered in the birth of New China with the Xibaipo Children's Group.(translated from douban)

title: Shaonian Yuefei Chuanqi
synopsis: As an animation giant with a legendary style, the film takes Yue Fei, a famous historical figure who has stayed in a thousand history, as the protagonist, telling how he turned from a suffering child to a talented and heroic teenager. The story of the film unfolds around a rich plot: why a thousand-year-old turtle spirit tried every means to kill him; how a little snake incarnates a beautiful girl (red bean) and Yue Fei developed an ignorant love; two daring and sharing difficulties How good brothers (Wang Feng, Niugao) embarked on a surprising and exciting journey with Yue Fei; conquered the thousand-year-old turtle spirit, giant python, and evil leopard, defeated all the masters, shot the king Xiaoliang, tattooed the mother-in-law, and became Wu Zhuangyuan.(translated from douban)

title: Wo Shi Da Xiongmao
synopsis: In the large forest in the remote plateau area, the panda family leads a carefree life. In the panda home, there is a red panda Hobby and his mother who also live here, but Hobby (voiced by Liu Chunyan) is white all over. It is a little white bear that has always been regarded as an alien by its kind, so the red panda always wants to leave the panda park. But on the other side, the red fox (voiced by Zhang Ai) and the cheetah (voiced by Han Qiaoen) have been eyeing the panda homeland, always wanting to occupy the panda park, but one day the panda paradise was turned into a ruin when a landslide broke out and a flash flood broke out. During the long journey, Hobby’s mother lost her precious life in order to save Hobby when the disaster happened. At the same time, the cheetahs were chasing after them. The red panda Hobby had to work with his friends and the red panda family through clever wisdom and tenacity. Fighting with their perseverance, they finally defeated the evil red fox and found their new home. Through this story, the little panda Hobby has become a real black and white panda, and it is also a real story of growing up.(translated from douban)
